_sText:
( Re-added with better screenshots, because it was trashed -.- )


This is my first map, I HAVE EVER RELEASED !

i made three bhop maps before this, they all sucked, but this one turned out alright. i added music through the map, and two custom textures at end.

# of levels- 3
# of bhop spots- 9
Song During map - All That Remains - Two Weeks

yes, it is a short map, but from my tester this is what he said:


TheDonFather: NICE start
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: O.o
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: you hear music?
TheDonFather: BADASS MAP
TheDonFather: BADASS
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: did you hear the music?
TheDonFather: yup
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: lmao you liek that song?
TheDonFather: ya
TheDonFather: goes great with it'
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: All That Remains - Two Weeks


other friend said:


-=TAG=-ACow[Falcon]: abit easy
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: yea
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: lmao
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: a bit?
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: rofl
-=TAG=-ACow[Falcon]: also its annoying how you have to wait for the blocks to rise back up
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: lmao,
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: it was set for .25
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: lucky it was set for 1, or 4
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: you like the backround music?
-=TAG=-ACow[Falcon]: yea
-=TAG=-ACow[Falcon]: goos thing it doesnt loop
-=TAG=-ACow[Falcon]: cuz it was starting to get old
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: lmao it doesnt >.>
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: it was sopose to lmao
Orange Tic Tac Chill...: w/e
-=TAG=-ACow[Falcon]: you should make it

Thanks for picking/looking (at) my map
